com.facebook.buck.testutil.integration

Class ProjectWorkspace

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.testutil.integration.ProjectWorkspace

  • public class ProjectWorkspace
extends Object
    ProjectWorkspace is a directory that contains a Buck project, complete with build files.

    When setUp() is invoked, the project files are cloned from a directory of testdata into a tmp directory according to the following rule:

    • Files with the .expected extension will not be copied.
    After setUp() is invoked, the test should invoke Buck in that directory. As this is an integration test, we expect that files will be written as a result of invoking Buck.

    After Buck has been run, invoke verify() to verify that Buck wrote the correct files. For each file in the testdata directory with the .expected extension, verify() will check that a file with the same relative path (but without the .expected extension) exists in the tmp directory. If not, Assert.fail() will be invoked.

      The result of running buck from the command line.

      void setUp()
      This will copy the template directory, renaming files named BUCK.test to BUCK in the process.
      void verify()
      For every file in the template directory whose name ends in .expected, checks that an equivalent file has been written in the same place under the destination directory.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProjectWorkspace

        public ProjectWorkspace(File templateDir,
                TemporaryFolder temporaryFolder)
        Parameters:
        templateDir - The directory that contains the template version of the project.
        temporaryFolder - The directory where the clone of the template directory should be written. By requiring a TemporaryFolder rather than a File, we can ensure that JUnit will clean up the test correctly.

    • Method Detail

      • setUp

        public void setUp()
           throws IOException
        This will copy the template directory, renaming files named BUCK.test to BUCK in the process. Files whose names end in .expected will not be copied.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • runBuckCommand

        public ProjectWorkspace.ProcessResult runBuckCommand(String... args)
                                              throws IOException
        Runs Buck with the specified list of command-line arguments.
        Parameters:
        args - to pass to buck, so that could be ["build", "//path/to:target"], ["project"], etc.
        Returns:
        the result of running Buck, which includes the exit code, stdout, and stderr.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getFile

        public File getFile(String pathRelativeToProjectRoot)
        Returns:
        the File that corresponds to the pathRelativeToProjectRoot.

      • verify

        public void verify()
            throws IOException
        For every file in the template directory whose name ends in .expected, checks that an equivalent file has been written in the same place under the destination directory.
        Throws:
        IOException
